Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/a0891e84bf0743b40ecfc0a8eb00c3aa/tumblr_inline_n5zntrmENB1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>At the behest of some last minute communications between Squad and our forum host, we’ve made the decision to postpone the start of the <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum.php"><strong>FORUM</strong></a> upgrade to Tuesday, May 27. The upgrade will still cause a downtown of up to 48 hours, so please plan accordingly.</p>

<p>Thanks to <strong>TrooperCooper</strong> for the pic.</p>

Mk sounds good.

The upgrade will still cause a downtown of up to 48 hours

Huehuehue

-snip-

Huehuehue

Lol. Its good they postponed it, because now I have time to get some of my crafts up onto my thread before they go down.
"Downtown?" Crap. I knew I should have had some coffee before putting that out. It stays.

arrrrrrgh. Want the annoying forum read bug fixed!! Well I've dealt with it this long a few more days won't kill me.

It is fixed right? Please tell me vBulletin fixed it...
So all those failed rockets are good for something... They make for great "derp" announcements!

"Downtown?" Crap. I knew I should have had some coffee before putting that out. It stays.

Life must be making the forums lonely...

Thats the day, Watchdogs arrives on PS4... i will probably have my attention elsewhere (maybe downtown ) that day. Nice date to pick.

Best luck and no kraken attacks to you!

Thats the day, Watchdogs arrives on PS4... i will probably have my attention elsewhere (maybe downtown ) that day. Nice date to pick.

Best luck and no kraken attacks to you!

Yes, my thoughts exactly. Now I won't have anything to distract me on this date.

Thats the day, Watchdogs arrives on PS4... i will probably have my attention elsewhere (maybe downtown ) that day. Nice date to pick.

Best luck and no kraken attacks to you!

Feel free to tell us how the game is over Twitter.
Atleast I'll be in school a majority of the time, but when I get home though.... nah, I'll just try to beat the Transformers Fall of Cybertron campaign on normal difficulty
Why do i have a suspicion we might find brand new 0.24 version waiting for us after everything comes back online? *one can dream...*

"Downtown?" Crap. I knew I should have had some coffee before putting that out. It stays.

Why do I now have the image of the various mods and developers doing synchronised dancing in a stage musical?

Teehee.
Tick... tock...

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, and what then shall we play?

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, now summer's gone away?

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, and what then shall we see?

Tick Tock, Until the day that thou shalt marry me.

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, and all the years they fly.

Tick Tock, And all too soon, you and I must die.

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, We laughed at fate and mourned her.

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, even for the Doctor.

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, he cradled and he rocked her.

Tick Tock, Goes the clock, 'Til River kills the Doctor.
Still isn't down yet... I think were all just waiting for that next refresh to not work now. :/
Oh yeah.... It's very exciting to wait for "Sorry, maintenance undergoing" screen to suddenly appear.
Darn it. I don't want it to end! My fav KSP forums! Don't go! No!
Noooooo... It's coming! "502 Bad Gateway" starts to appear.
Yup, thought it was down. It's not!
502 errors appear during daily backups of the forum database. It's not started yet.

502 errors appear during daily backups of the forum database. It's not started yet.

Oh my. Is there no way to switch the forums into a read-only state while doing backups? Such error messages look rather unprofessional.
Or even to use a forum/database that can cleanly handle backing up the database live without showing silly errors...
What exactly caused the first forum wipe? Should I be concerned about this update?

What exactly caused the first forum wipe? Should I be concerned about this update?

*gasp* I seem to have forgotten! Wasn't it a hacker attack or something?
